00023 #ifndef FFEADCONTEXT_H_
00024 #define FFEADCONTEXT_H_
00025 #include "XmlParser.h"
00026 #include "Reflector.h"
00027 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00028 #include "AfcUtil.h"
00029 
00030 class Bean
00031 {
00032         friend class FFEADContext;
00033         string name,inbuilt,value,clas,bean,intfType,injectAs;
00034         bool realbean;
00035         vector<string> injs,names,types;
00036 };
00037 typedef map<string,Bean> beanMap;
00038 class FFEADContext {
00039         beanMap beans,injbns;
00040         map<string,void*> objects;
00041         bool cleared;
00042 public:
00043         FFEADContext(string);
00044         virtual ~FFEADContext();
00045         void* getBean(string);
00046         void* getBean(Bean);
00047         void clear();
00048 };
00049 
00050 #endif /* FFEADCONTEXT_H_ */
